Christopher Ahern
Post-doctoral researcher at University of Pennsylvania

About

I’m a post-doctoral researcher at the University of Pennsylvania where I work with Robin Clark in Linguistics and Josh Plotkin in Biology. My research focuses on using computational and statistical tools to understand how and why languages change over time.
